data.meta_description: Read stories about #agedifference, #mpreg, and #bl on Wattpad, recommended by shenun

A little dragon cub came to Hongmeng Academy, which is dedicated to the children of the fairy world. Ji Chaoyun died unexpectedly in his previous life and relived his life. He just wanted to practice assiduously. But he was aloof and arrogant, and his roots were bad. He couldn't even take the dragon's horns back when...

Ye Shu transmigrated into the book he had just read and became the first cannon fodder minister who was brought down by the tyrannic male lead; by the death of a thousand cuts and the like. Loves In The Air

Group of brothers went to the lake to make medicine for their father. But came across a group of princes that are friends. Seeing a group of beauties they can't just let them go without knowing them at all.

stay with me [BxB] mpreg

There's one thing though, she completely remembers her past life, but she doesn't even realize it. These unexplained dreams were supposed to be a gift, but will Wang Shu be able to realize it before...

Founder Of Demonic Cultivation

What if Wei Wuxian didn't die? What if they didn't try to kill him? What if they all lived in harmony? Would it be better? Or would another chaos emerge?

The Blind Concubine

A blind concubine lives in the cold palace. The blind concubine has a snow white cat. Day after day, year after year, he lives quietly in the courtyard of the cold palace. It is as if he has already been forgotten by the entire imperial palace. Until one day, the young emperor accidentally chances upon him... This sto...
